title: Greatsword Proficiency
content:
Greatsword Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Greatswords. Requirements Githyanki

Greatsword Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Greatswords.

Greatsword Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
